name: The Treehouse Man
description: A horrible corruption has forced the children of the forest into hiding. They confide in the Treehouse Man, but their prayers remain unanswered. Baptized into the group, you must take the hallowed boat on an odyssey to save your brothers and sisters before the silence kills them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2 GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct inputs compatible controller highly recommended
